Articles.Content:
(first thread yay )

So here i will be posting some rockets and maybe even some spaceplanes (but mostly rockets). Currently there is only stock parts in these rockets. PS: just for any of you wondering, the name came from kurtjmac's first rockets.

Wolfie

This is the original and the one that started all of this.

What i have made is a light-medium orbiter that's very strategically made and easy to steer. If you really want it it can also go to the moon (and you dont even need to save on your fuel for that!).

Download link: http://www./?etmwq0q26wlor15

Oh right, pic:

Airborne wolf

This one is a orbital spaceplane, i made it for the K prize, 100 percentage SSTO and capable of a few extra small operations once its back at kerbin (in case you miss the runway). The first person to do the K-prize piloting award with this spaceplane can have the reward and credit, be sure to post a reply! (note: Leave vehicle design credit to me though,)

Download link: http://www./?1gjcxo8t57v7uzo

And ofc the pic:

Wolfie IP lander

This one is for heavy landings on any planet you might wish, just dont try to do it on Eve, wont work (PS: birthday gift frome me <3)

Download link: http://www./?gn8ppx3lggnpbyi

Picture:

One rocket every week for you to explode, all rockets are tested with mechjeb.

Edited October 3, 2012 by ThatDebri
